data.title: Influencers in Iran – TOP 10 on Instagram and Tiktok
data.meta_description: Here are the biggest Iranian influencers on Instagram and TikTok– along with a step-by-step guide on how to find more influencers in Iran. Read here!
data.text:
← Find influencers in other countries in Asia

Iran is a country with a vibrant culture and many inspiring influencers. However, it can be tough to find the right social media influencers in Iran because there are so many of them! So, how can you discover influencers who are a good fit for your brand?

Here is a list of the most popular Iranian influencers on Instagram with a simple guide on how to find relevant Iranian influencers for your brand!??

The biggest influencers in Iran

TOP 10 Iran-based influencers on Instagram:

Hasan Reyvandi (@hassan_reyvandi) – 19.4M followers

Mahe Man (@mahnaz_afshar) – 18.1M followers

Golshifteh Farahani (@golfarahani) – 16.4M followers

Ali Karimi (@aliiiiiiiikarimi8) – 14.7M followers

Mohammad Reza Golzar (@rezagolzar) – 12.8M followers

Ali Daei (@alidaei) – 12.2M followers

Rambod javan رامبد جوان (@rambodjavan1) – 11.9M followers

Armin Zareei (@arminzareeiofficial) – 4M followers

Serna Amini (@serna_amini) – 10.2M followers

Amin Hayaiee (@amin.hayai) – 9.6M followers

TOP 10 most followed Iranian influencers on Tiktok:

Ashkan.ws (@ashkan_ws) – 1.2M followers

Parwana(@parwana_tajik_o) – 0.2M followers

Maryawhs (@maryawhs) – 0.2M followers

shahrzad__tik_tok (@shahrzad__tik_tok) – 0.2M followers

Hi (@11ghida8) – 0.1M followers

Hailey Gacha (@hailey.__.gacha) – 0.1M followers

Zohre.mohamadi7172 (@zohre.mohamadi717) – 0.1M followers

Kf. Yasser (@tdm.yasser) – 0.1M followers

Positive Affirmations (@posotiveaffirmations) – 0.1M followers

Yoongi’s (@iel.luna) – 0.1M followers

? Your guide to finding Iranian influencers

In general, there are two ways to find Iran-based influencers: searching for influencers manually or using an influencer search tool. Here are some tips for both approaches!

1. Searching for influencers on Google

The easiest way to find influencers is by searching on Google – you might have already given it a shot! You can search for keywords like top Iranian influencers, Iranian bloggers, or influencers in Tehran. The more precise your search words are, the more accurate results you’ll find!

2. Searching manually on social media

Another way to find influencers is by searching by hashtags and keywords on Instagram: make sure to check relevant hashtags like #Iran, #Iranianinfluencer, or #Iranianblogger. If you’re looking for influencers in a specific city, try keywords and hashtags related to these cities.

Secondly, you can check locations like Iran, Tehran, and other major cities. Additionally, you can check local restaurants, cafes, and other places that influencers might go to.

Once you’ve found an influencer you’d like to work with, you can check profiles that are similar to theirs. This way, you will see a list of similar influencers you might want to work with!

When it comes to manually finding influencers on TikTok, the search process works in a similar way: you can search using hashtags, keywords, and phrases. Sometimes, the TikTok search works even better!

When using your phone, you can even apply filters to your search. If you’re specifically looking for influencers, choose “Users” from the top menu and use the filters to view profiles with more than 10,000 or 100,000 followers.

3. Using an influencer search tool

If you don’t want to spend a lot of time searching for influencers on your own, we suggest using an influencer search tool.

Promoty is one of such tools. We have a massive database with 250 million social media influencers from all around the world. By applying filters based on influencers’ interests, location, social media statistics, audience demographics, and other criteria, you can easily discover the perfect influencers for your brand.

If you’re looking for Iran-based influencers, just set the Location field to “Iran” or any relevant city in Iran – or use the keyword search.

If you’re looking for influencers with a Iranian audience, set the Audience Location field to “Iran”. Additionally, you can filter influencers by age, gender, location, audience demographics, and other criteria.

For every influencer, you can see their detailed profile analytics: engagement rate, average likes, audience demographics (age, location, gender), followers’ credibility, previous sponsored posts, followers’ growth over time, similar profiles, and more.

That helps you to spot fake followers and find relevant influencers whose audience matches your target group.

Summary: the best ways to find Iranian creators for your brand

In general, there are two ways for finding relevant influencers for your brand.

Firstly, you can try searching manually on Instagram, using keywords, hashtags, and similar profiles. However, this method may take more time and effort.

Alternatively, you can use an influencer search engine that enables you to find suitable Iranian influencers in just a few minutes. This option is highly recommended as it can save you hours of time and help you find more relevant influencers.

We suggest giving the second option a try: you could save hours of time and find better influencers. Create a free account and experience it yourself! ??
